articles.title: Google unveils modest upgrades to Pixel smartphones, other gadgets
articles.summary: Alphabet’s Google introduced on Wednesday a new lineup of Pixel smartphones and gadgets, intensifying its efforts to embed artificial intelligence across a wide ecosystem of products.
articles.translated_title: Google unveils modest upgrades to Pixel smartphones, other gadgets
articles.translated_summary: Alphabet’s Google introduced on Wednesday a new lineup of Pixel smartphones and gadgets, intensifying its efforts to embed artificial intelligence across a wide ecosystem of products.

articles.title: Google's Pixel 10 phones raises the ante on artificial intelligence
articles.summary: Google on Wednesday unveiled a new line-up of Pixel smartphones injected with another dose of artificial intelligence that’s designed to do everything from fetch vital information stored on the devices to help improve photos as they’re being taken.
articles.translated_title: Google's Pixel 10 phones raises the ante on artificial intelligence

articles.title: Nvidia Stock Sinks On Fears Of AI Bubble, AI Winter
articles.summary: Nvidia stock has pulled back from recent highs amid concerns of a bubble in artificial intelligence stocks.
articles.translated_title: Nvidia Stock Sinks On Fears Of AI Bubble, AI Winter
articles.translated_summary: Nvidia stock has pulled back from recent highs amid concerns of a bubble in artificial intelligence stocks.

articles.title: Nancy Mace demands answers from Hertz over AI scanners charging hundreds of dollars for minor scratches
articles.summary: House Rep. Nancy Mace (R-SC) wants answers from Hertz over its artificial intelligence-powered scanners.
articles.translated_title: Nancy Mace demands answers from Hertz over AI scanners charging hundreds of dollars for minor scratches

articles.title: Gaxos.AI (GXAI) Shares Pull Back After Surge On New AI Platform Launch
articles.summary: Shares of Gaxos.AI are pulling back Wednesday morning. The stock soared yesterday following the company's announcement of its new artificial intelligence platform.
articles.translated_title: Gaxos.AI (GXAI) Shares Pull Back After Surge On New AI Platform Launch

articles.title: N.S.A.’s Acting Director Tried to Save Top Scientist From Purge
articles.summary: Vinh Nguyen, an expert in artificial intelligence and advanced mathematics, was among the current and former officials whose security clearances were revoked by the president.
articles.translated_title: N.S.A.’s Acting Director Tried to Save Top Scientist From Purge
articles.translated_summary: Vinh Nguyen, an expert in artificial intelligence and advanced mathematics, was among the current and former officials whose security clearances were revoked by the president.

articles.title: US tech stocks slide after Altman warns on AI future and MIT study casts doubt on the hype
articles.summary: Investors’ long-running enthusiasm for artificial intelligence showed signs of faltering on Tuesday as tech stocks tumbled.
articles.translated_title: US tech stocks slide after Altman warns on AI future and MIT study casts doubt on the hype
articles.translated_summary: Investors’ long-running enthusiasm for artificial intelligence showed signs of faltering on Tuesday as tech stocks tumbled.

articles.title: Is the A.I. Sell-off the Start of Something Bigger?
articles.summary: A sharp drop in technology stocks, and even comments by OpenAI’s Sam Altman, suggest investors are getting too exuberant about artificial intelligence.
